About Me

My name is Lakshay Goyal. I'm a BCA student at K.R. Mangalam University with a focus on web and app development and a solid background in data analytics. With my DevOps experience, I can build streamlined APIs and make it easier for different apps to communicate with one another, resulting in reliable and effective solutions. I am dedicated to lifelong learning and innovation and am passionate about using technology to solve practical challenges.
